segments.source_content: Docusaurus has a community of thousands of developers.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 擁有數千名開發者組成的社群。

segments.source_content: On this page we've listed some Docusaurus-related communities that you can be a part of; see the other pages in this section for additional online and in-person learning materials.

translations.zh-hant: 本頁列出了您可以參與的 Docusaurus 相關社群；關於其他線上與實體的學習資源，請參閱本節的其他頁面。

segments.source_content: Before participating in Docusaurus' communities, [please read our Code of Conduct](https://engineering.fb.com/codeofconduct/). We have adopted the [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/) and we expect that all community members adhere to the guidelines within.

translations.zh-hant: 在參與 Docusaurus 社群之前，[請先閱讀我們的行為準則](https://engineering.fb.com/codeofconduct/)。我們採用了《貢獻者公約》([Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/))，並期望所有社群成員遵守其中的準則。

segments.source_content: Stack Overflow is a popular forum to ask code-level questions or if you're stuck with a specific error. Read through the [existing questions](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/docusaurus) tagged with **docusaurus** or [ask your own](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/ask?tags=docusaurus)!

translations.zh-hant: Stack Overflow 是一個熱門的論壇，適合提出程式碼層級的問題或當您遇到特定錯誤時尋求協助。瀏覽標記為 **docusaurus** 的[現有問題](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/docusaurus)，或[提出您自己的問題](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/ask?tags=docusaurus)！

segments.source_content: There are many online forums for discussion about best practices and application architecture as well as the future of Docusaurus. If you have an answerable code-level question, Stack Overflow is usually a better fit.

translations.zh-hant: 有許多線上論壇可供討論最佳實踐、應用程式架構以及 Docusaurus 的未來發展。如果您有可解答的程式碼層級問題，通常 Stack Overflow 會是更適合的選擇。

segments.source_content:
- [Docusaurus online chat](https://discord.gg/docusaurus)
  - [#help-and-questions](https://discord.gg/fwbcrQ3dHR) for user help
  - [#contributors](https://discord.gg/6g6ASPA) for contributing help
- [Reddit's Docusaurus community](https://www.reddit.com/r/docusaurus/)

translations.zh-hant:
- [Docusaurus 線上聊天室](https://discord.gg/docusaurus)
  - [#help-and-questions](https://discord.gg/fwbcrQ3dHR) 提供使用者協助
  - [#contributors](https://discord.gg/6g6ASPA) 提供貢獻者協助
- [Reddit 上的 Docusaurus 社群](https://www.reddit.com/r/docusaurus/)

segments.source_content: For new feature requests, you can create a post on our [feature requests board (Canny)](/feature-requests), which is a handy tool for road-mapping and allows for sorting by upvotes, which gives the core team a better indicator of what features are in high demand, as compared to GitHub issues which are harder to triage. Refrain from making a Pull Request for new features (especially large ones) as someone might already be working on it or will be part of our roadmap. Talk to us first!

translations.zh-hant: 對於新功能請求，您可以在我們的[功能請求看板 (Canny)](/feature-requests)上發文，這是一個便於規劃路線的工具，並允許按投票數排序，這讓核心團隊能更清楚地了解哪些功能需求較高，相較於較難分類的 GitHub 議題。請避免直接為新功能（尤其是大型功能）提交 Pull Request，因為可能已經有人在開發或將成為我們的路線圖的一部分。請先與我們討論！

segments.source_content: For the latest news about Docusaurus, [follow **@docusaurus** on X](https://x.com/docusaurus) and the [official Docusaurus blog](/blog) on this website.

translations.zh-hant: 關於 Docusaurus 的最新消息，請在 X 上[追蹤 **@docusaurus**](https://x.com/docusaurus) 以及本網站的[官方 Docusaurus 部落格](/blog)。
